subject: Football
lead_paragraph: The West Texas district attorney who prosecuted the former N.F.L. quarterback Ryan Leaf in 2009 said he would file a motion to revoke Leaf’s probation after his arrest in Montana.
snippet: The West Texas district attorney who prosecuted the former N.F.L. quarterback Ryan Leaf in 2009 said he would file a motion to revoke Leaf’s probation after his arrest in Montana.
